short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow a user to share the current page on Homesync

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Homesync Share Plugin allows you to quickly and easily share content on Homesync and all your social media accounts. By clicking the Homesync share button, you will be able to directly post the current page to your Homesync account without having to leave the page you are on.
